data.system_settings: Linux Mint 19.1; Windows 10 Home, 10.0.17763 build 17763; macOS Mojave 10.14.2
data.actual_result: The server image does not reappear until you hover your mouse over the icon
data.expected_result: The server image should immediately reappear
data.short_description: When you drag a server image, there is a delay
data.steps_to_repro: - Drag a server image away from a window. - This was previously reported on , but was marked as resolved. Problems are still happening.
